Yay! A Victorious Galio Skin!

...

{{item:3070}}{{champion:3}}{{item:3070}}

Well, can't say she {{champion:15}} deserved ANOTHER new skin, but what are you going to do. Looks like the color scheme would be the same as Warden's.

May be wrong that it's Sivir's. Hanging onto the small hope that its {{champion:84}} , {{champion:89}} , or {{champion:55}}. Scream "easy" or "OP" all you want, but there's a reason why those champ's receive so much hate.
Well those 3 are not marksmen and Riot said Victorious is going to a Marksman
Championship and victorious are 2 different skin lines.....
maybe we could all stop being stupid and know that its obviously a {{champion:10}}  skin
or maybe its {{champion:133}}
Really? Of all the people to choose they go with Sivir? That's really disheartening. Would have been awesome to have nearly anyone else. Oh well...

it goes to the champion with the most presence in the competitive scene for that season. Sivir was a constant presence all year due to her reliability and team utility with her ult. J4, Janna, Elise, and Morgana all had big impacts on the seasons they got victorious skins so it only makes sense.

That's not true at all. J4 in season 1 wasn't the most impactful pick. Same with Morgana last year.

If you have an official report from Riot saying that I might believe you, but otherwise I'm calling BS.
{{champion:59}} was season 1... {{champion:40}}  was season 2 but yea its based on most influential of season i think. that or just highest pick/ban rate(not 100% sure)
Nothing against Sivir,but now I don't have to worry about climbing to Gold just for the Victorious skin.

yeah, sivir + warden skin = not worth xD
